text: Love Letters is a 1945 American romantic drama movie directed by William Dieterle and was based on the novel Pity My Simplicity by Christopher Massie. It stars Jennifer Jones, Joseph Cotten, Ann Richards, Cecil Kellaway, Gladys Cooper, Anita Louise, Reginald Denny and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for four Academy Awards in 1946. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1945 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by William Dieterle
title: Love Letters (1945 movie)
